page.title: 16SHOPS IN CHURCHDOWN
page.content: There are several shops in Blacksmith Lane, Churchdown.They cater for the necessities of everyday life.There is a hardware store which sells nails, wood,paint and garden tools. Next to that there is a clothes and shoe shop,with a hairdressers upstairs. Alongside that there is a newsagents, where they sell newspapers,magazines and sweets. The next shop will be the butchers when they move in.Also on Church Road there is a fish'n'chip shop and next to it another hairdressers.At the other end of Church Road,on Paynes Pitch is a greengrocers,where they sell fruit,vegetables and seeds.On the other side of the road is a post office.Also in Church Lane opposite The Bat'n'Ball(a public house),is the local Spar shop(a general store and grocers like Sainsburys only smaller).
